generated_body: If you click on "The most talked-about movie moments of the 2010s," you can expect an overview of significant scenes and events from popular films released during that decade. It is likely to include examples from various genres, providing context on why these moments resonated culturally and how they influenced cinematic trends. Overall, the piece should serve as a reflection on the decade's cinematic achievements and their impact on viewers.
